storyName: Find Your Way Through the Snow
storyInfo: The Holy Hunt, to which all three clans are participant, is about to commence. Inside the hall, the Great Elder and Enya exchange their thoughts.

attributes.text: Enya, I hope you will work to become the Saintess.
For Karlan Trade to go further in Kjerag, we need a Saintess, and this is the perfect opportunity.
Of course, things won't be so simple.
You and I know exactly what the other two clans are planning. But I believe that as soon as you are touched by the snow, you will pass the trials and become the Saintess.
Enya, I know you can do it.
Of all my arguments and doubts, I voiced not a single one.
Because I knew exactly how he would respond. Just as always.

attributes.content: Dear, would you look at that. Isn't that Sir Enciodes?
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner A

attributes.content: Impossible. Tomorrow is the day of the Holy Hunt. The Master is surely preparing his offerings to the Saintess, so why would he be patrolling his territory so early in the morning?
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner B

attributes.content: Wait, that really is Sir Enciodes!
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner B

attributes.content: I heard it used to be forbidden to ride burdenbeasts to Mount Karlan.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner A

attributes.content: Especially those seeking an audience with the Saintess. They had to keep their palms together, eyes on the ground, head bowed in prayer from the moment they left home.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner A

attributes.content: Look at the Master now. Does he intend to follow the old tradition?
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner A

attributes.content: Yeah, I've heard of that tradition before, but the Master... Even someone of his status intends to walk up the mountain one step at a time with his head bowed?
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner B

attributes.content: What are you talking about? The Master is also a child of Kjeragandr. Don't tell me you're one of those Paleroche idiots who've forgotten the scriptures.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner A

attributes.content: What kind of fool do you take me for? That's not what I meant!
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner B

attributes.content: I'm just worried about the Master. You know as well as I do that the other two clans are insatiable. The Master proposed to return the Saintess to power, and they weren't too happy about that.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner B

attributes.content: They are jealous of all the progress that the Master has brought, and even sabotaged one of our railways. I heard they're in bed together now, working to keep Kjerag sealed.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner B

attributes.content: They wouldn't dare. Resorting to violence right before Kjeragandr's eyes would anger Her.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner A

attributes.content: Is there anything they wouldn't do?
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner B

attributes.content: Today, the Master is walking through the streets unarmed. Tomorrow, the three clans will be sending their forces up to the mountains to hunt. What kind of blasphemy could they possibly commit?
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner B

attributes.content: Hush, you're going to invite misfortune if you keep talking like that! O Kjeragandr, please bless the Master with a safe journey!
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner A

attributes.content: O Kjeragandr, please bless the Master with a safe journey!
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner B

attributes.content: Enciodes, I didn't think we'd see any worshippers as devout as you in this day and age!
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble

attributes.content: My apologies, Mr. Pale. The Master is participating in an important ceremony and has to pray all the way there, so he cannot answer you right now.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: But allow me to offer you my regards on his behalf.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: No worries, I am the one at fault. O Kjeragandr, please forgive me.
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble

attributes.content: However, the road from Turicum to Karlan is long, and I'm afraid that others will be worried if they see Enciodes like this.
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble

attributes.content: Don't worry. The Master made up his mind to do this long ago.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: We will protect him all the way.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: That's a relief. May Kjeragandr bless Silverash.
attributes.name: Kjerag Noble

attributes.content: May Kjeragandr bless you as well.
attributes.name: Weiss

attributes.content: It always feels like the beasts start panicking before the hunt even begins.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You can tell how the beasts are behaving just from looking out the window?
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: From the shifting of the snow.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: That being said, make sure you watch your feet tomorrow on the day of the Holy Hunt.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: The Great Elder is here.
attributes.name: Kjarr

attributes.content: Ugh. I have plenty of things to watch out for as it is.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Are you ready, Enya?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I've prepared my luggage and my speech.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Don't worry, Great Elder, this isn't the first time I've done this ceremony.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: This one will be unlike anything in the past.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I heard that Enciodes is coming to visit Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It's good that he's willing to show piety at a time like this.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Silverash also ordered a number of idols from the Vine-Bear Court not long ago, and enshrined them in places that lacked them.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Did Enciodes really become so religious overnight?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Saintess, whether or not his devotion is true is for Her to judge. It is not our place.
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: But, even those ignorant of Kjeragandr will be converted and pray to her after seeing a majestic aurora.
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: Looking at things this way, to become devout overnight is actually a manifestation of Her power.
attributes.name: Elder A

attributes.content: Regardless of Enciodes's motivations, his conduct is beyond reproach.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: As long he upholds the faith with his actions, then there is nothing for you to be concerned about, Saintess.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: In the end, all the people of Kjerag must bow to thousands of years of tradition.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I hope so.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enciodes aside, the other two clan leaders will head up the mountain and wait.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Since you will be accepting the transfer of power from the three clans, your speech will need to be more than just satisfactory.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Whether during the Holy Hunt or the ceremony itself, if you seem to display any sort of bias towards the three clans, people will immediately interpret that as a sign that a clan has gained or lost power.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I understand the significance of the bell that I hold, and have thought extensively about how to wield it.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: There's just one more thing, the hunting longbow. Please allow me to use it.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enya, you are familiar with the records of the previous Saintesses, and should know that the Saintess is not required to personally join the hunt. Were you planning to use this longbow at the ceremony initiating the Holy Hunt?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Although the Saintess is not required to personally join the hunt, it should not be an affront to Kjeragandr if she does so.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: This has been the tradition in the Vine-Bear Court for thousands of years. You must not disregard your status, Saintess.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: The Saintess must accept the offerings of the three clans on behalf of Kjeragandr, bestowing food upon Kjeragandr's children in Her place during the ceremony.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: What would it mean if the Saintess hunted the prey with her own hands?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Besides, this isn't some kind of safari for your amusement.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: You're right. In thousands of years, there has never been a precedent for the three clans to cede power to the Vine-Bear Court.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The transfer of power was originally meant to be a peacekeeping measure, but these days, turmoil wells up beneath Mount Karlan, and the land meant to be handed to the Saintess is being senselessly torn apart.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: As if they are not afraid to blaspheme Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Kjeragandr's children need the Saintess to appease Her anger and show Her that the pious hearts of the people of Kjerag have not changed for thousands of years.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Maybe what Kjeragandr needs is a Saintess who will convey her wrath.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Don't invite ill omens within the temple.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: And in addition, 'those who toil will hold power, and those who idle will suffer.'
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Though the three clans are supposedly ceding their power to the Saintess, it is not for the sake of handing over any true authority.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But in order to maintain the faith's standing, I cannot simply wait for the bounties of the three clans. I am not trying to portray them as incompetent, but rather leading by example.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: If maintaining the faith's standing is what you care about, then it is impossible to speak of change.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Kjeragandr's children have already moved forward. The prayers they offer to Her are certainly different from what they were a thousand years ago.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And surely, She is not responding to them the same way She did a thousand years ago.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I heard that the Master set off from the old Silverash estate early in the morning and walked all the way here on his two feet, without resting or taking even a single sip of water.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner C

attributes.content: Dad, let's fetch a bowl of water for him.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner C

attributes.content: To follow the old ways, he cannot eat, drink, or sleep the entire way there.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner D

attributes.content: But... it's already been a whole day, dad. Our town is only halfway to Mount Karlan.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner C

attributes.content: He's about to leave, and the sun's going to set too. Who knows what kind of dangers are out there in the snow...
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner C

attributes.content: Oh, he's coming...
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner D

attributes.content: Silverash's team quietly passes through the street at dusk. Enciodes keeps his head bowed, his palms folded as he silently prays in the direction of Mount Karlan in the distance.
Those who hear his footsteps peek out from the windows curiously, leave their doorways, or stand on both sides of the street.
Dad...
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner C

attributes.content: If I can't get him some water to drink... then I want to follow him to the foot of Mount Karlan.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner C

attributes.content: I decided to follow the Master when he opened a factory to teach me about technology. Now that he is demonstrating his faith and going to worship at Mount Karlan, that makes me want to follow him all the more.
attributes.name: Kjerag Commoner C

attributes.content: Without a word, the people stand up, go down the stairs, and follow the Silverash guards into the snow.
